On Fri, 29 Nov 2002 12:25:22 -0800 (PST), Peter Kleczka wrote:

>I've read that textXXX() methods execute in 
>the order that they appear in the source file.
>My tests seem to confirm this.

Running junit-tests from an ant-script leads to the
execution of the tests in vice-versa order.

Getting the names of the methods is only possible with
reflection. How the array of names will be handled depends
on the junit-version being used and isn't specified.


Regards, Lothar
